sub_topic: Identifying the clique number of a graph.
message_1: Consider a graph that contains 7 vertices. If the graph has a maximum clique of size 3, what is the clique number of the graph?
message_2: The clique number of a graph is the size of the largest clique in the graph. Since the graph has a maximum clique of size 3, the clique number of the graph is 3.
